newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Bear kills boy in Russian nature reserve.
newsitem.headline: Bear kills boy in Russian nature reserve.

text.p: A six-year-old boy was mauled to death by a bear after climbing onto the roof of its enclosure in a Caucasus nature reserve, Itar-Tass news agency said on Sunday.

Tass said the brown bear, which had been rescued by wardens as an orphaned cub, grabbed the child by one leg and pulled him into the enclosure. Police arrived within minutes and shot the bear, but the boy died of his injuries.
